name: Glow (itch) (TollerHovler, ISmellArmPit, Ilutzio)
description:
In times of darkness and despair, the ancient druidic order Wardens of Glow is willing to sacrifice everything, to gather the light and bring it to those in need.

You are the leader of one such group of Wardens, venturing into the arboreal forest to fight the shadows of prey.

Even though you will eventually meet your destiny, you pave the way for druidic siblings to walk in your footsteps, and maybe one day, the world will become a brighter place.

Goal:

Protect the lantern from the increasing threat of darkness creeping up on the wardens. Keep carrying the lantern forward and defend it from the enemies. Wardens who isn't carrying the lantern will use their magic to defend it.

Controls:

Left-click a Druid: Control it.

WASD or Arrow keys: Move Druid.

Click one Druid, drag mouse cursor to another Druid: Change their places.

Spacebar: Pick up Lantern (if close enough) or drop Lantern.

Game mechanics:

When a Druid collects Glow, his/her attack-power increases relative to the amount of Glow.

However, if he/she dies the Glow will be lost.

If he/she walks close to the Lantern, the Glow will be deposited into the score.

Every minute, reinforcements arrive by teleportation.

A Druid holding the Lantern cannot attack.
